name: JS
message: Newport Company: It has come to my attention the grave danger that smoking cigarettes projects. I understand that you want to make money and I respect that, however, I cannot respect how you go about doing it. It isn't much different than a drug dealer on the street selling dope to good, honest people. Tobacco causes harm. You realize the moral problem I have with this! But you do it anyway, resulting in cancer. There are honest ways to make money. Please consider this for the sake of your fellow Americans. These are your children, your grandchildren, that will be born but birth defects from an addiction you have supplied.
